definition: to eat tofu/(fig.) to flirt/to tease
to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])

sentences.english: We have tofu and pork for lunch on Fridays.
sentences.chinese: 我们每个周五中午吃豆腐和猪肉。

sentences.english: Am I really helping global warming by switching from chicken breasts to bean curd?
sentences.chinese: 我不吃鸡胸肉而改吃豆腐，这有助于减缓全球变暖吗？

definition: to take advantage of sb/to freeload
to take liberties with a woman/to dally/to assail a woman with obscenities
to come to blows/to paw/to grope/to get fresh
to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])
(onom.) sound of muffled laughter (chuckling, tittering etc)/sound of stammering
pervert (esp. one who gropes women in public)
to raise and lower one's hand (idiom); to signal as conspiratorial hint/fig. conspiring to defraud
to eat meat after having maintained a vegetarian diet/(fig.) to do sth as a novel experience
